# Flirt Hair Extensions
> Pretoria's premier hair extension salon offering premium European Virgin 100% Remy human hair

## About
Flirt is a first of its kind one stop extension shop. We offer a premium range of European Virgin 100% Remy human hair extensions. Flirt is a full service salon bringing hair extensions directly to the public to make it accessible to everyone.
